headline: Hotel stocks - here are winners and losers from weak dollar
summary: Investing.com --A weakness in U.S. dollar will create an unusual earnings swing for global hotel and travel companies in the first quarter with groups that have large non-U.S. revenue exposure to see earnings boost. The dollar weakness follows a period of strength in early 2025, which has created an outsized foreign-exchange impact in the March quarter that should fade as the year progresses.The move is a material tailwind for U.S. dollar–reporting companies with high international revenue or US
